title: WCAS ENGLISH 392-0-20 The Situation of Writing

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Writers are the inheritors, perpetuators, and innovators of literary culture. In this class we will explore the contemporary landscape of creative writing, with a particular emphasis on the role of small presses and small journals and magazines. We will explore how venues for writing, including online publications, shape contemporary literature. We will discuss the distinct missions and personalities of a number of presses, while exploring the relationship between press and practitioner. This course is designed especially for students who hope to forge careers as writers, and it will challenge all participants to think creatively about the place of literature in our society.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: ENGLISH 392 is a requirement for all senior creative writing majors. Other students may enroll with department consent.

subject: ENGLISH
